snippet: Elise Jordan, the widow of the investigative war journalist Michael Hastings, talks about her decision to publish “The Last Magazine,” a satirical novel he wrote about his internship at Newsweek.
abstract: Elise Jordan, widow of investigative war journalist Michael Hastings, has pushed for publication of The Last Magazine, satirical novel he wrote about his internship at Newsweek; Jordan calls novel, which is being published by Blue Rider Press, her late husband's best book.
lead_paragraph: Elise Jordan, the widow of the investigative war journalist Michael Hastings, talks about her decision to publish “The Last Magazine,” a satirical novel he wrote about his internship at Newsweek.

headline.seo: Michael Hastings’s Widow Discusses ‘The Last Magazine’
headline.main: Publishing a Novel to Preserve a Legacy
